text: The 2015–16 Khuzestan Premier League season was the 16th season of the Khuzestan Premier League which took place from September 25, 2015 to March 17, 2016 with 14 teams competing from the province of Khuzestan. Teams played home and away with one another each playing 26 matches. Persepolis Shush finished the season on top of the standings and was promoted to division 3 of the Iranian football system. Meanwhile, finishing in last place, Yaran Abadan will be relegated to the Khuzestan Division 1 league. == Teams == {| class="wikitable sortable" !Team !Location !Stadium !Capacity |- |Persepolis Shush |Shush |Takhti Shush Arena | style="text-align:center" |5,000 |- |Esteghlal Ramhormoz |Ramhormoz |Takhti Ramhormoz Arena | style="text- align:center" |10,000 |- |Esteghlal Khoramshahr |Khorramshahr |Shahrdari Khorramshahr Arena | style="text-align:center" |5,000 |- |Sepahan Izeh |Izeh |Takhti Izeh Arena | style="text-align:center" |10,000 |- |Abi Pooshan Hamidieh |Hamidiyeh |Takhti Hamidieh Arena | style="text-align:center" |5,000 |- |Persepolis Veys |Veys |Veys Martyrs Arena | style="text-align:center" |5,000 |- |Esteghlal Ramshir |Ramshir |Takhti Ramshir Arena | style="text- align:center" |10,000 |- |Jonub Sheyban |Mollasani |Mollasani Martyrs Arena | style="text-align:center" |5,000 |- |Vahdat Andimeshk |Andimeshk |Sarvandi Arena | style="text-align:center" |5,000 |- |Shahbaz Shadegan |Shadegan |Takhti Shadegan Arena | style="text-align:center" |10,000 |- |Parsian Bandar-e Emam |Bandar-e Emam Khomeyni |Takhti Bandar-e Emam Arena | style="text-align:center" |10,000 |- |Pakdelan Abadan |Abadan |5 Mehr Abadan Arena | style="text-align:center" |5,000 |- |Mahshahr Golden Stars |Mahshahr |Mahshahr Martyrs Arena | style="text-align:center" |10,000 |- |Yaran Abadan |Abadan |5 Mehr Abadan Arena | style="text-align:center" |5,000 |- |} == Final Standings == == Results == == See also == * 2015–16 Azadegan League * 2015–16 League 2 * 2015–16 League 3 * 2015–16 Hazfi Cup * 2015 Iranian Super Cup == References == Category:Khuzestan Premier League 1 Iran
